main.name: Soumya Bhatnagar
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio:
Currently pursuing MBA HR at NMIMS Mumbai (2023 batch).

3 years of experience in Talent Acquisition and HR operations at a Digital Marketing and IT Startup.

Skilled in: Talent Acquisition, End-to-end recruitment cycle, IT and Non-IT recruitment, Campus placements, Onboarding, Setting up processes, Employee Engagement activities, and Sourcing.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration - BBA(H) Human Resources Management/Personnel
education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Talent Acquisition Consultant
work.description: Talent Acquisition (End to end recruitment) for the roles of - Business Development, Digital Marketing and Graphic Designer. Organised Campus placement for the role of international sales and digital marketing analyst.Involved in Head hunting for Business Development / International Sales and Digital Marketers.

work.title: Talent Acquisition Manager
work.description:
Single-handedly managed the HR department for DeltaX. Primarily took care of the entire recruitment cycle, starting from sourcing the candidates to closing a profile and onboarding the candidates.
Specialized in tech recruitment for freshers and conducted more than 100 campus placements in the campus placement season of 2019.

skills.name: End to End Recruitment Cycle Management

testimonials.text:
‚ÄúHi! My name is Somu.‚Äù said a girl in white frock 20 years ago to a girl who had no idea about the lifetime package that came with her.
The story has a lot of chapters but little did we know that we would become
From strangers to best friends forever
From talking about what to play today to what to chose in life to never ending list.
It‚Äôs amazing to see such a pretty girl turn into a beautiful woman.
And being with you in that process is such a blessing. You‚Äôve always said to maintain stuff, efforts from both the ends matter.
Since you‚Äôve always been on my side
I never realised how important you are to me,
Until I was about to lose you.
Since that day there has been no day that I didn‚Äôt put my step ahead and live up to what we‚Äôre entitled too - BFF
Obviously can‚Äôt imagine to lose a gem like you. Even though I‚Äôm uncertain about some things in life but I‚Äôm certain that I love you and will genuinely continue to love you forever.
It‚Äôs already been 20 years and I know it would continue till the last breath
Can‚Äôt blame myself for such a dramatic speech
After all it was for you lol.

Happy Birthday babe!
Perfect Summing up of ‚ÄòUS‚Äô‚ù§Ô∏è for me would be a two way time-to-time ‚ÄòYou can count on me, like one two three and I‚Äôll be there‚Äô‚ù§Ô∏è
Cheers to years of rants, same choices, sharing(to the level of having the same crush!Ì†ΩÌ∏Ç), biology discussions(Duh!Ì†ΩÌ∏Ö),shitty decisions, growing up together, first share of the happiest or the worst news, crying and laughing and what not‚Ä¶..things already done and things to come!‚ù§Ô∏è Let‚Äôs keep this writeup all good only for now!Ì†ΩÌ∏Ç
Love youÌ†æÌ¥≠‚ù§Ô∏è
